title: Did Bernie Sanders Say an ‘Evil Billionaire’ Should Donate Funds to Govt., Not Students?
subtitle: A satirical web site attributed made-up remarks to the 2020 presidential hopeful, but the comments were re-published without context.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders called businessman Robert F. Smith an "evil billionaire" and criticized him for donating money to graduating college students, rather than the federal government.
